cards.name: Arya Stark
cards.text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After Arya Stark enters play, place a prayer token on up to 5 different characters you don't control. If Arya Stark leaves play, discard those tokens. Reaction: After a character with a prayer token is killed, stand Arya Stark and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Blood of the First Men
cards.text: Character you control only. Attached character gains the Old Gods trait. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [stark] character, kneel attached character to have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: Robert Baratheon
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After Robert Baratheon gains power, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: "I swear to you, I was never so alive as when I was winning this throne, or so dead now that I've won it."

cards.name: Long May He Reign
cards.text: King character only. Attached character cannot be killed. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge as the defending player, sacrifice Long May He Reign.

cards.name: Ser Jorah Mormont
cards.text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Ser Jorah Mormont is discarded from your hand, put him into shadows instead of placing him in your discard pile.

cards.name: Mercenary Contract
cards.text: Attached character gains the Mercenary trait. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, pay 1 gold and kneel Mercenary Contract to stand attached character.
